column2: Formulate an ontology related to event. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/ontology#> .ex:Event a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Event" ;    rdfs:comment "An occurrence of some significance, typically involving multiple entities and having a location and time." .ex:Location a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Location" ;    rdfs:comment "A geographical place where an Event takes place." .ex:Time a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Time" ;    rdfs:comment "A specific point or period when an Event occurs." .ex:Organizer a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Organizer" ;    rdfs:comment "An entity responsible for planning or coordinating the Event." .ex:Participant a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Participant" ;    rdfs:comment "An entity that takes part in an Event." .ex:hasLocation a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Event ;    rdfs:range ex:Location ;    rdfs:label "has location" ;    rdfs:comment "Property linking an Event to its Location." .ex:occursAt a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Event ;    rdfs:range ex:Time ;    rdfs:label "occurs at" ;    rdfs:comment "Property linking an Event to its Time." .ex:organizedBy a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Event ;    rdfs:range ex:Organizer ;    rdfs:label "organized by" ;    rdfs:comment "Property linking an Event to its Organizer." .ex:hasParticipant a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Event ;    rdfs:range ex:Participant ;    rdfs:label "has participant" ;    rdfs:comment "Property linking an Event to its Participants." .ex:startTime a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Time ;    rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;    rdfs:label "start time" ;    rdfs:comment "The time at which an Event starts." .ex:endTime a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Time ;    rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;    rdfs:label "end time" ;    rdfs:comment "The time at which an Event ends." .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: event. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/ontology#> .ex:Event rdf:type owl:Class .ex:Location rdf:type owl:Class .ex:Time rdf:type owl:Class .ex:Person rdf:type owl:Class .ex:hasLocation rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Event ;    rdfs:range ex:Location .ex:hasTime rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Event ;    rdfs:range ex:Time .ex:hasParticipant rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Event ;    rdfs:range ex:Person .ex:isLocatedAt rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Location ;    rdfs:range ex:Event ;    owl:inverseOf ex:hasLocation .ex:occursAt rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Time ;    rdfs:range ex:Event ;    owl:inverseOf ex:hasTime .ex:participatesIn rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ex:Person ;    rdfs:range ex:Event ;    owl:inverseOf ex:hasParticipant .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: event.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/event#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Event a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Event" ;    rdfs:comment "A generic occurrence that may encompass one or more happening." .:Location a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Location" ;    rdfs:comment "A geographical point or area where an event occurs." .:Time a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Time" ;    rdfs:comment "A temporal point or duration in which an event occurs." .:Person a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Person" ;    rdfs:comment "An individual participating in an event." .:hasLocation a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Event ;    rdfs:range :Location ;    rdfs:label "has location" ;    rdfs:comment "The property linking an event with its location." .:hasTime a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Event ;    rdfs:range :Time ;    rdfs:label "has time" ;    rdfs:comment "The property linking an event with its time." .:hasParticipant a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Event ;    rdfs:range :Person ;    rdfs:label "has participant" ;    rdfs:comment "The property linking an event with a participant." .:latitude a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Location ;    rdfs:range xsd:float ;    rdfs:label "latitude" ;    rdfs:comment "The latitude of a location." .:longitude a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Location ;    rdfs:range xsd:float ;    rdfs:label "longitude" ;    rdfs:comment "The longitude of a location." .:startTime a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Time ;    rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;    rdfs:label "start time" ;    rdfs:comment "The start time of an event." .:endTime a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Time ;    rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;    rdfs:label "end time" ;    rdfs:comment "The end time of an event." .:name a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Person ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "name" ;    rdfs:comment "The name of a person." .```
